text: The Rifleman is an American western television series that aired on ABC from 30 September 1958 to 8 April 1963 for 5 seasons and 168 episodes. It stars Johnny Crawford, Chuck Connors, Paul Fix, Bill Quinn, Patricia Blair, Hope Summers, Harlan Warde, Chris Alcaide and is related to the NBC western television series Law of the Plainsman. ==Other websites== * * * Category:Western (genre) television series Category:1950s television series Category:1958 television series debuts Category:1963 television series endings Category:English-language television programs
title: The Rifleman
